name: roseli-berry
effect: Held: Consumed when struck by a super-effective Fairy-type attack to halve the damage.
short_effect: Held: Consumed when struck by a super-effective Fairy-type attack to halve the damage.

flavor_text_entries.x-y:
If held by a Pokémon, this Berry will
lessen the damage taken from one
supereffective Fairy-type attack.
flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
If held by a Pokémon, this Berry will lessen the
damage taken from one supereffective
Fairy-type attack.
